name: user-data-dir
description: Specifies the directory that user data (such as cookies, history, and cache) should be written to and read from.

name: disable-extensions
description: Disables extensions from being installed or running.

name: disable-gpu
description: Disables hardware acceleration using the GPU.

name: disable-plugins
description: Disables plugins from being installed or running.

name: remote-debugging-port
description: Specifies the port number for remote debugging.

name: window-size
description: Specifies the initial size of the browser window.
